thread.title: How to Get Adele's Cat Eye - Adele Grammys Beauty 2017
thread.title_full: How to Get Adele's Cat Eye - Adele Grammys Beauty 2017

author: Kristina Rodulfo
title: How to Get Adele's Cat Eye - Adele Grammys Beauty 2017

organizations.name: marc jacobs beauty genius gel super-charged oil-free foundation

text: Getty Advertisement - Continue Reading Below On top of being a red carpet standout and stealing the show with not one, but two performances at the Grammys tonight, Adele's makeup was A+. Her makeup artist, Michael Ashton, prepped her skin with Ole Henriksen and used Marc Jacobs Beauty products to get the classic glam look. "When it comes to creating Adele's red carpet looks, I like to take references from classic styling, films, and iconic images, then reinterpret them with my own aesthetic," Ashton said, "This gives an end look that is polished and current but also softly elegant and timeless." Most Popular A photo posted by Michael Ashton (@michaelashton) on Feb 12, 2017 at 3:15pm PST Here, a step by step guide: 2. For your base, apply Marc Jacobs Beauty Genius Gel Super-Charged Oil-Free Foundation (Adele's shade is 26 Bisque Medium). 3. Apply Remedy Concealer Pen in 2 Wake-Up Call to the under eye area, T-Zone, and high planes of the face. Then, add depth with the #InstaMarc Light Filtering Contour Powder in Dream Filter 20 under the cheekbones and around the hairline. Getty 5. Swipe Twinkle Pop Stick Eyeshadow in Volver 402 across the eyelid then contour the socket with Style Eye Con No 7 Plush Eyeshadow Palette in Lolita 206. 6. For the cat eye, start from the inner corner of the eye and extend toward the outer corner using Magic Marc'er Precision Pen Waterproof Liquid Eyeliner in Blaquer. Finish the top and bottom lashes with Velvet Noir Major Volume Mascara . 7. Fill the lip with Le Marc Liquid Créme in Slow Burn 458 and Fawn Over Me 452. More from ELLE:
